item.description:
Time to hike the Twins & Galehead!

We meet at the Gale River Trailhead where we will set up a car spot. We then drive over the the N. Twin Trailhead where we begin our hike. We follow the N. Twin trail to the summit of N. Twin mountain. From here we follow the N. Twin Spur trail to the summit of S. Twin mountain. We then descend via the N. Twin Spur trail to the Galehead hut. From the hut we will ascend Galehead mountain and then descend via the Gale River Trail to our car spot.

Distance - 12 mi
Time - 9:40
Elevation Gain +3932

-------------------------------------------
IMPORTANT NOTES

Please bring some type of water shoes just in case. The three crossings of Little River on this trail are very difficult or impassable at high water.

It is YOUR responsibility to be prepared with the proper gear and knowledge. This is a strenous hike and not suitable for beginners.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like the guy in my photo
item.name: The Twins & Galehead
